member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The field {0} must match the regular expression '{1}'..

member.summary: Creates a logger enriched with additionnal data from the .
member.remarks: If an exception occurs, it returns a simple, not enriched, valid logger.
member.returns: Always returns a new valid logger.

member.name: M:SocialCrunch.Infrastructure.Services.Settings.CryptographyTools.Encrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts the plainText input using the given Key. A 128 bit random salt will be generated and prepended to the ciphertext before it is base64 encoded. A 16 bit random Initialization Vector will also be generated prepended to the ciphertext before it is base64 encoded.
member.returns: The salt, IV and the ciphertext, Base64 encoded.

member.name: M:SocialCrunch.Infrastructure.Services.Settings.CryptographyTools.Decrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts the ciphertext using the Key.
